short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filters YouTube videos by duration and removes Shorts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
YouTube extension where you can filter out videos based on time by setting the minimum and maximum minute length a video can be. 

This extension includes the following features:

•Filter videos based on minimum and maximum duration.
•Hide playlists.
•Remove YouTube Shorts.
•Remove comments and community posts.
•Unfilter subscription feeds, channel pages, and search results as needed.

Take control of your feed and fix your attention span.
